Brazil 3 vs. Northern Ireland 0 in the 1986 World Cup

Information about the 1st Round Group D game played in the 1986 Soccer World Cup between the National Teams of Northern Ireland and Brazil with details about goals, starters and reserves, substitutions, cards and more.

Game played in the 1986 World Cup, 1st Round Group D

Date: Thursday, June 12, 1986

Northern Ireland 0 - 3 Brazil
Goals:
  15' Careca
  42' Josimar
  87' Careca
